com.jaunt
Class Comment

java.lang.Object
  com.jaunt.Node
      com.jaunt.Comment

public class Comment
extends Node

Represents an HTML/XHTML comment, CDATA section, DOCTYPE declaration, or processing instruction.

Since:
0.9.0
Author:
Tom Cervenka

Field Summary
static short CDATA
          commentType constant denoting a comment of type CDATA (eg, <![CDATA[ text ]]>)
static short DOCTYPE
          commentType constant denoting comment of type DOCTYPE (eg, <!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/strict.dtd">)
static short IRREGULAR
          commentType constant denoting an irreglar HTML/XML comment (eg, <! comment >)
static short PROCESSING_INSTRUCTION
          commentType constant denoting a comment of type processing instruction (eg, <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>)
static short REGULAR
          commentType constant denoting a reglar HTML/XML comment (eg, <!-- comment -->)

Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

Comment

public Comment(String text,
               short commentType)
Creates a Comment of the type denoted by the type constant, containing the specified text.

Parameters:
text - the text content; for comments of type REGULAR it is the text between <-- and --> for comments of type IRREGULAR it is the text between <! and >; for comments of type CDATA it is the text between <![CDATA[ and ]]>; for comments of type DOCTYPE it is the text between <!DOCTYPE and >; for comments of type PROCESSING_INSTRUCTION it is the text between < and >.
commentType - a comment type constant.
Method Detail

getCommentType

public short getCommentType()
Returns the comment type constant associated with this comment.

setText

public void setText(String text)
Sets the text content of the Comment.

Parameters:
text - the text content; for comments of type REGULAR it is the text between <-- and --> for comments of type IRREGULAR it is the text between <! and >; for comments of type CDATA it is the text between <![CDATA[ and ]]>; for comments of type DOCTYPE it is the text between <!DOCTYPE and >; for comments of type PROCESSING_INSTRUCTION it is the text between < and >.

getText

public String getText()
Retrieves the text content of the Comment.

Returns:
the text content; for comments of type REGULAR it is the text between <-- and --> for comments of type IRREGULAR it is the text between <! and >; for comments of type CDATA it is the text between <![CDATA[ and ]]>; for comments of type DOCTYPE it is the text between <!DOCTYPE and >; for comments of type PROCESSING_INSTRUCTION it is the text between < and >.

returns String representation of the commentType constant.

Returns a String representation of the Comment.
